original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1151)@</color>在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4696)@</color> 秒內使我方全體武將受到的治療量以及增益狀態時間提升 <color=#ccffcc>40%</color> 同時受到的傷害以及減益狀態時間降低 <color=#ccffcc>20%</color>，並在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4701)@</color> 秒內每秒恢復 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_HP(4701)@</color> 點體力。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1151)@</color> within <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4696)@</color> seconds Increase the amount of healing and gain state time received by all our generals <color=#ccffcc>40%</color> Reduce simultaneous damage and debuff state time <color=#ccffcc>20%</color>, and <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4701)@</color> Recovers points of physical strength every second within seconds. <color=#ccffcc>$Status_HP(4701)@</color>.
